item.title: Danny Yagan - About
item.description: Danny Yagan is Assistant Professor of Economics at the University of California-Berkeley, Faculty Research Fellow of the National Bureau of Economic Research, Faculty Co-Director of the Taxation and Inequality Initiative of the Berkeley Opportunity Lab, and Faculty Associate of the Berkeley Burch Center for Tax Policy and Public Finance. He holds a BA summa cum laude and PhD in economics from Harvard. Between his degrees, he worked as a management consultant at McKinsey & Company.
